explanation: The code computed pow(M-1, N, mod) but did not reduce the entire expression modulo mod. The term (-1)**(N%2)*(M-1) can be outside the modulus, so the final answer must be taken modulo mod. I fixed the single line by taking the whole sum modulo mod.
fixed_code:
N,M=map(int,input().split())
mod=998244353

answer = ((-1)**(N%2)*(M-1) + pow(M-1,N,mod)) % mod
print(answer)
